name: 洪媽益
objective: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
schedule:
Week 1 Course orientation / What is technical writing?
Week 2 Writing Paragraphs/Essays (Vocab 1)
Week 3 Features of Academic Writing / Audience (Vocab 2)
Week 4 Writing General-to-specific texts (Vocab 3)
Week 5 Writing Paraphrases/Summaries / Progress and Periodic Reports (Vocab 4)
Week 6 Writing Introduction / Science Lab reports (Vocab 5)
Week 7 Writing Introduction / Data Collection  (Write Introduction)
Week 8 NTUT APPLINGX (Peer Reviews)
Week 9 Library Lecture
Week 10 Problem, Process, and Solution / Problem Solving (Vocab 6)
Week 11 Writing Methodology / Informal Proposals (Write Methodology)
Week 12 MAterials and Equipment Formal Proposals (Vocab 7)
Week 13 Data Commentary / Document Design and Visual Aids (Vocab 8)
Week 14 Writing Results (Vocab 9)
Week 15 Writing Discussion (Write Results and Discussion)
Week 16 Writing Abstract/Conclusion (Write Abstract)
Week 17 Oral presentations
Week 18 Final paper due
scorePolicy:
Weekly homework + Vocabulary building 40%
Final presentation 20% (Paper Intro)
Final paper 20% (formal proposal)
materials: Weissberg, Robert and Suzanne Buker. 2008. Writing up research: Experimental research report writing for students of English. Taipei: Pearson.
